about_the_game:
Welcome to the asteroid! Here, you'll build a sanctuary that meets the diverse needs of residents from passing star systems!
Assign tasks to your robot workers, construct landing pads, and accommodate a variety of guests. Unlock new furniture, build rooms, and decide who your sanctuary caters to. Discover the needs of inhabitants from distant corners of the galaxy and see if you can fulfill them.



Explore diverse star systems, each with unique climates and inhabitants. Encounter planets ranging from icy to tropical, offering various goods for sale. Navigate threats like meteor showers, mood altering nebulas and galactic conflicts.



Welcome a variety of guests, each with distinct preferences and needs shaped by their species and faction affiliations. Whether they're carnivores or herbivores, members of peace-loving or intolerant factions - it’s up to you to make the best of their traits.



Decorate rooms in military, religious, or futuristic styles. Place tables, chairs, and specialized devices like gambling machines, decontaminators and fuel distributors. Unlock better furniture through faction interactions and manage room access based on guest preferences.



Use varied kitchen equipment to experiment with ingredients and cater to guests' needs. Unlock asteroid harvesting, build processing machines, greenhouses and worm nests, to make your asteroid more self-sustaining.



Seek help from allied factions during crises and events. Enjoy discounts on products from friendly planets. Make choices - which of the two conflicted factions will you support? Can you afford to suffer the retaliation of their enemies?

name: StarKeeper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 6100 / AMD FX-8300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750Ti / AMD RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 9400f / AMD RYZEN 3500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: StarKeeper is a management sim where you run a bar on an asteroid hurtling through the endless cosmos. Unlock new furniture and resources to accommodate your culturally and species-diverse guests. Established relationships will help you survive threats and affect the shape of star systems.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Japanese
